noun.description: A point where two systems, subjects, organizations, etc. meet and interact.
examples: the interface between accountancy and the law

noun.description: A device or program enabling a user to communicate with a computer.

verb.description: Interact with (another system, person, organization, etc.)
examples: his goal is to get people interfacing with each other

verb.description: Connect with (another computer or piece of equipment) by an interface.
